name: Anastasiia Berezina
description: I am a Frontend developer with 1 year of experience in a company specializing on TV broadcasting technologies and 6 years of teaching experience as a Biology and Chemistry teacher in state schools. My main aim is to create impeccably designed and convenient web projects. I am available for both offline and remote job format.
sch1621: School 1621 supported by the Israeli Embassy in Moscow
researchCenter: Lead students’ research in Biology and Ecology at the school research center
biochem: Taught all classes of middle and high school Biology and Chemistry
exams: Prepared students to entrance exams in Biology
projects: Organized students’ research in collaboration with other teachers
JewishEdu: Organized activities and explored educational concepts in collaboration with the chair of Jewish education
applications: Maintained and developed web applications for TV broadcast
library: Maintained a reusable UI elements library using Vue JS
pixel: Pixel Perfect HTML, CSS & JavaScript development
org: Organizing and supervising larger groups of people
